attributes.title: DIY Handmade Paper and Bookbinding for BEGINNERS!
attributes.description:
Head to http://shadyrays.com/TangleFree with code: HOWHARD for 30% OFF their best-selling Tangle Free Aviator.



This show asks the question "How hard could it be, if I just did it myself?!" And somewhere along the way, Lindsey will find the answer.



In today's episode, Lindsey is joined by Elyse Willems, as they try their hand at paper making and book binding, all from scratch! Whose work will end up as the front, and whose will end up at the back of the book? Find out in the premiere episode of "How Hard Could it Be?" 



Subscribe to All Good No Worries for new episodes of Please Be Nice To Me every month! 

Merch: https://store.roosterteeth.com/collec...

attributes.title: Wake and Bake: How to Make Tiramisu on 420
attributes.description:
Head to http://shadyrays.com/TangleFree with code: HOWHARD for 30% OFF their best-selling Tangle Free Aviator.

This show asks the question "How hard could it be, if I just did it myself?!" And somewhere along the way, Lindsey will find the answer.

It's 420 y'all and these gals know how to celebrate. In today's episode Lindsey is joined by Taydertot, as they attempt to make a tiramisu with a twist! Can these baked beauties create a delicious dessert and follow simple instructions? Or will they stare into space constantly forgetting the next step? Find out in the new episode of How Hard Could it Be?

attributes.title: How Hard Could it Be to Build a Ukelele?
attributes.description:
Go to http://shadyrays.com/tanglefree and use code HOWHARD to get 30% off their best-selling Tangle Free Aviators.
Go to http://coloradopettreats.com and use the code HOWHARD10 at checkout for 10% off your order.

This show asks the question "How hard could it be, if I just did it myself?!" And somewhere along the way, Lindsey will find the answer.

Today Lindsey has invited Charlotte to the show to make a ukelele. ALRIGHT it's a kit, but it's not totally pre-built, there are a lot of elements. It looked easy and Lindsey thought "is this TOO easy???" Well I think she may find out otherwise and see how hard it could be. Also if you're gonna spray paint, do it in a well ventilated area, sheesh. 

Subscribe to All Good No Worries for new episodes of How Hard Could it Be? every month!
